Package bootcamp.oop.designExercise

Class ColdBeverage

java.lang.Object
bootcamp.oop.designExercise.Beverage
bootcamp.oop.designExercise.ColdBeverage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Produceable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Soda, SoftDrink
public abstract class ColdBeverage extends Beverage
This abstract class contains the basic functionality methods for a cold beverage. it extends the abstract class Beverage.
Author:
Liran Hadad

  • Constructor Details

    • ColdBeverage

      public ColdBeverage(int price, int temp, int volume, String ingredient)
      This constructor receives the following fields and sets values through the abstract class Beverage constructor, in addition of new field ingredient.
      Parameters:
      price - - is the price of this beverage by using abstract class Beverage constructor
      temp - - is the required temperature of the beverageby using abstract class Beverage constructor.
      volume - - is amount of the beverage to pour by using abstract class Beverage constructor.
      ingredient - - is a string represents the main ingredient flavor of the drink

  • Method Details

    • getIngredient

      public String getIngredient()

    • produce

      public void produce()
      This method provides the drink for the user according the desired volume of the beverage. In addition it subtracts the volume amount from the vending machine water tank.
